refnamediv.refpurpose: Searchs the items for the best match to the language

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Object oriented style
Locale
static string lookup arraylangtag stringlocale stringdefault
Procedural style
string locale_lookup arraylangtag stringlocale stringdefault
Searchs the items in $langtag for the best match to the language range specified in $locale according to RFC 4647's lookup algorithm. to $locale

&reftitle.parameters;
langtag
an array containing a list of language tags to compare (Maximum no. allowed is 100)
locale
the locale to use as the language range when matching
default
the locale to use if no match is found

&reftitle.returnvalues;
closest matching language tag, $default, or empty string
